page.title: 11The Hayle By_Pass
page.content: Since the by_pass has been built Hayle has become a better place because it is not so busy with traffic.The roads are a lot safer to cross and the noise level is down.One of the things that the by_pass has improved is speed of communications.Another thing is that since a lot of the cars are going on the by_pass, there has not been so much dust and dirt in the air. The people that own shops,public houses and cafes are effected by the by_pass because it means that they are losing customers.People who do bed and breakfast are also losing trade, people who are tired and want to stay the night now drive passed on the by_pass. Wild flowers have already established themselves on the verges and look lovely.
